title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2604.1 - Purpose, scope and applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2604.1 - Purpose, scope and applicability

State Regulations
(a) The purpose of this Part is to provide
rules and procedures for the New York State Environmental Facilities

Corporation (corporation), in conjunction with the New York State Department of

Health (department), to provide financial assistance from the New York State

Drinking Water Revolving Fund (DWSRF) created by chapter 413 of the Laws of
1996. (b) This Part, in conjunction
with the applicable rules and regulations of the department, 10 NYCRR Part
53, applies to all parties seeking or receiving financial assistance from the DWSRF
and to the activities of the corporation and the department in the discharge of
their duties related to the DWSRF. For the purposes of the corporation, to the
extent this Part conflicts with 10 NYCRR Part
53, this Part shall
prevail. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21

2604.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
